GlossaryTerm.TermName: stage III transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter
GlossaryTerm.TermPronunciation: (... tran-ZIH-shuh-nul sel KAN-ser ... REE-nul PEL-vus ... YER-eh-ter)

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cancer has spread (1) from the muscle layer of the renal pelvis to fat around the renal pelvis or to tissue in the kidney; or (2) from the muscle layer of the ureter to fat around the ureter.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage III transitional cell cancer of the renal pelvis and ureter"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y uréter en estadio III"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y uréter en estadio III

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El cáncer se diseminó 1) desde la capa muscular de la pelvis renal a la grasa que rodea la pelvis renal o al tejido del riñón; o 2) desde la capa muscular del uréter a la grasa que rodea el uréter.

RelatedInformation.RelatedSummaryRef: Transitional Cell Cancer of the Renal Pelvis and Ureter Treatment
Tratamiento del cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y de uréter
